title: Gold Medal, SCiUS Forum 14th, Thammasat University, Rangsit campus
shortDescription: Achieved Gold Medal for a project predicting KDML 105 rice moisture content. Analyzed data with SPSS to build a regression model and deployed it on a web application (HTML, CSS, JS) that predicts moisture based on density.

title: First Place – SATIT Hackathon: Innovation for Equitable Education
shortDescription: First Place – SATIT Hackathon: Innovation for Equitable Education by developing and pitching an innovative solution concept designed to provide equitable access to educational resources.

title: POSN computer Camp 2
shortDescription: Developed advanced algorithms and data structures skills using C++, applying problem-solving, algorithm design, programming proficiency, and efficiency in competitive programming.

title: Honorable Mention – Web Page Creation Competition 2022
shortDescription: Received Honorable Mention for a web page demonstrating proficiency in UI design, content creation, and web development tools at Computer Education KKU Open House 2022, Faculty of Education, Khon Kaen Universit
